repository.local package¶

class repository.local.File(uuid, rep, index=None)[source]¶

Bases: repository.file.File

File within a local repository.

For images the following properties are read out from EXIF tag if available: width, height, rotation, creation_date, description, rating, tags.

Properties:

uuid (str): Relative path to the root directory of the local repository. rep (repository.Repository): Repository containing the file. type (int): Type of the file. Determined based on the extension of the

file. The following values may be returned: TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown file type (default) TYPE_IMAGE: Image file TYPE_VIDEO: Video file

width (int): Width of the file content in pixels. Default is 0. height (int): Height of the file content in pixels. Default is 0. rotation (int): Clock-wise rotation of the content in degrees. The only

values allowed are 0, 90, 180 and 270. Default is 0.
orientation (int): Orientation of the content considering rotation. The
following values may be returned: ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE: Content wider than high (default) ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT: Content heigher than wide
creation_date (DateTime): Creation date of the file content. Creation
date of file used as fallback.
description (str): Description of the file content. Default is empty
string.

rating (int): Rating of the file content. Default is 0. tags (set of str): User defined tags on the file. Not to be confounded

with EXIF tags in image files. Default is empty list.
EXT_IMAGE = ('*.jpg', '*.jpeg')¶
EXT_VIDEO = ('*.mp4', '*.mv4')¶
class repository.local.FileIterator(rep)[source]¶

Bases: repository.repository.FileIterator

Iterator which can be used to traverse through files in a repository with local file base.
